resources.string: Please visit blubPhone.mlanner.com to get the Ubuntu application or to contact the developer.
You are not yet connected. Please connect to this Smartphone from your Ubuntu.\n
Your are connected; have fun with blubPhone!\\nBuy the developer a beer at \"todo\"!
You won\'t be able to use the blubPhone service anymore.
Click here to allow Ubuntu to connect to this Smartphone. You have to be in the same WIFI/WLAN like your computer.
Please enable your WIFI/WLAN to get blubPhone started.
Enjoy writing and receiving SMS on your Ubuntu. Click to disconnect.
blubPhone is waiting for a connection from Ubuntu. Please connect to the IP:%s or click here to cancel.
